datasource_id: Meta exec. says 'preservation of elections' is very important to the company - The Global Herald@The Global Herald@2023-06-25 17:34:29.914271@Meta
data:
Yahoo Finance published this video item, entitled “Meta exec. says ‘preservation of elections’ is very important to the company” – below is their description.
#meta #yahoofinance #cannes #ai #2024elections
Meta is ramping up innovation across all of its segments in its “year of efficiency.” Nicola Mendelsohn, Meta Head of Global Business Group, sits down with Yahoo Finance at the 2023 Cannes Lions Festival to discuss the outlook for AI, digital advertising on Reels, and what the platform is prioritizing in 2023 and ahead of the 2024 election.
